attributes.title: Webinar: Decoding the Maya Matrix with Paramahamsa Nithyananda
attributes.description:
The following elements will be discussed in this webinar:
Understand the components of the Maya Matrix
How to “test” your own reality to confirm that you are indeed under the Maya Matrix. 
How to tell whether you are in control, or the Maya Matrix is in control of you. 
What is 'Sadashivoham', and what does it have to do with the Maya Matrix? 
How to break open the Matrix, and become The ONE.
